name: 5-Minute Hip Opener Flow
description: Quick hip mobility routine targeting all angles of hip movement. Great before leg day or as a daily mobility practice.

exercises.name: 90/90 Hip Switches
exercises.notes: Keep chest tall, rotate from hips not spine. 30s each side.
exercises.description: Sit with both legs at 90 degrees, switch sides by rotating through hips

exercises.name: World's Greatest Stretch
exercises.notes: Elbow to instep, then rotate and reach to ceiling

exercises.name: Frog Stretch
exercises.notes: Rock forward and back gently, don't force depth
exercises.description: Wide knee position on all fours, hips sink back

exercises.name: Pigeon Pose
exercises.notes: Square hips, fold forward for deeper stretch. 30s each side.
exercises.description: Front leg bent at 90, back leg extended

exercises.name: Deep Squat Hold
exercises.notes: Heels down if possible, use support if needed
exercises.description: Asian squat position, elbows press knees out

sequence.flow: Hold each position, transition smoothly between exercises
